channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiRecorder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiRecorder

item.title: CVE-2022-41333|2024-10-23T14:31:29.673Z -- fortinet -- fortirecorder
item.description: An uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability [CWE-400] in FortiRecorder version 6.4.3 and below, 6.0.11 and below login authentication mechanism may allow an unauthenticated attacker to make the device unavailable via crafted GET requests.
